summary: Adds Descriptions on all Shrines including Dawnguard and Dragonborn
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s10.postimg.org/k9ri27xzt/shireblessinglogo.jpg[/img]

How many times have you walked up to a shrine in game and wondered...

'WTH does this give me?' only to chose it and only once its to late see that its useless to your character

Well Shrine Blessings now gives Descriptions on all Shrines including Dawnguard and Dragonborn

Install

Use a Mod Manager or to install manually just unzip the file and add the esp to your data folder.Put it before anything that changes the shrines...

Â no spells or enchantments were altered in the making of this mod.


Mod inspired by :
Gophers Lets Play Skyrim series (lost count how many times he asked what each shire did)
and after searching nexus for something like this finding one by
MGE but not updated since 2012 so decided to make my own.

All Information for the Shrines taken from the ElderScroll Wilki.
author: Viglen
